    "period": "Byzantine Empire, Early Middle Ages, reign of Emperor Maurice and Phocas' usurpation",
    "period_reasoning": "The play centers on characters named Maurice and Phocas. Historically, Maurice was a Byzantine Emperor who ruled from 582 to 602 CE and was overthrown by Phocas who ruled from 602 to 610 CE. The text mentions Phocas as a 'Capitaine' who was made Emperor after a revolt, which aligns with the historical usurpation. There are also mentions of 'Tibère' (likely Emperor Tiberius II Constantine, Maurice's predecessor) and references to the imperial succession.",
